context_bundle.summary: KALIC security pipeline: vuln_scan.sh (nmap/nikto/lynis), dep_audit.sh (npm/pip/cargo), owasp_check.sh (code analysis). Main dispatcher: kalic_security.sh. Accepts W20TASK_DISPATCH JSON format.

onboarding.quick_start: Send task via AHK: {type:'SCAN'|'AUDIT', target:path, params:{tool:'vuln_scan'|'dep_audit'|'owasp_check'}}. Reports to C:/PhiDEX/security_pipeline/reports/
common_patterns: vuln_scan: nmap port scan, nikto web scan, lynis system audit
dep_audit: npm audit, pip list --outdated, cargo audit
owasp_check: injection, path traversal, input validation
